data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Nebbi, Uganda, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nebbi, Uganda

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 13,723 believers in Nebbi, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Nebbi unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, help your children in Nebbi, Uganda find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Gujarati people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Gujarati people.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Nebbi who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, help the people of Nebbi, Uganda to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Nebbi.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

location.name: Nebbi
location.people_groups_list: Karamojong, Chinese, general, Amba, Hindi, Arab, Lebanese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Karamojong (849,000), Chinese, general (19,000), Amba (54,000), Hindi (5,800), Arab, Lebanese (15,000)
